abstract: The CradlePoint PHS300 Personal Hotspot may have been first to the battery-powered Wi-Fi racket — but it’s been lapped by the MiFi in size, price, battery life, simplicity and beauty.

lead_paragraph: Last week in The Times, I reviewed the astonishing Novatel MiFi, which becomes available this weekend from Verizon.
